alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale; Limestone (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 4:27PM CST until January 01 at 5:15PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Lauderdale County in northwestern Alabama... Northern Limestone County in north central Alabama... * Until 515 PM CST. * At 426 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rogersville, or 17 miles east of Florence, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rogersville, Ardmore, Lexington, Elkmont, Anderson, Lester, Good Springs, Cartwright, Oliver and Mt Rozell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for north central and northwestern Alabama...and Middle Tennessee.
